header.title: Hello, I'm Beatrice.
header.subtitle: I'm a PhD Student in Digital Humanities.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am an architect and building engineer, with way too many hobbies (especially singing, pottery making and anything related to DIY!). I am currently doing a PhD in Digital Humanities at the DHLAB (EPFL). In my research I am studying the urban evolution of Jerusalem between 1840 and 1940 through the lenses of western cartography.
